price: Àwọn tó ń sọ pé: “Olúwa wa, dájúdájú àwa gbàgbọ́. Nítorí náà, forí àwọn ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ wa jìn wá. Kí O sì ṣọ́ wa níbi ìyà Iná.”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā innanā āmannā fa-igh'fir lanā dhunūbanā waqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri
